synopsis:
Norasco episodes released only on 3 of the 4 Norasco DVDs.
DVD 1: Tanjoubi-hen. A special included meant to promote the 7th Down Town Taito International Comedy Film Festival. This was the 16th and final episode in the disc.
DVD 3: Naiken. Where Kotarou helps get his friend get an apartment. This was the 3rd episode on the DVD.Taxi. Kotarou hangs out with a taxi driver when an old woman gets in. This was the 12th episode on the DVD.
DVD 4: Nushi. The boys go fishing. This was the 3rd episode on the DVD.Hiyashi Chuuka. Kotarou visits a noodle shop. This was the 10th episode on the DVD.Kendama. The boys play with a kendama. This was the 13th episode on the DVD.
